Title: 5089: The Action RPG
Genre: Action, Indie, RPG
Developer: Phr00t's Software
Publisher: Phr00t's Software	
Release Date: Feb 4, 2016

About This Game

5089 expands upon 3089, bringing you back to planet Xax 2000 years later. After the mysterious events in the year 4089, the Overlord hasn't been heard from for the last millennium, and so the experimental robots have continued to wage war according to their program. Without the Overlord to repair the damage, Xax has fallen into a state of chaos and dereliction. However, a shadowy new power has risen... how will your presence turn its fate?
Shoot, sneak, build, talk, slash, buy, sell, fly, swing, hover, scavenge, teleport & conquer your way through an endlessly generated planet. You can do it all with a friend, too. 5089 includes a rework of 3089 & does not require the original to play.

Update v1.55

Fixed a crash when building structures in otherwise empty areas. 
Improved the map cursor, especially in virtual reality. 
Added a 5089-novr.bat launcher that will run the game without virtual reality, even if a headset is detected. 
Updated mouse control system in virtual reality; Vive cursor control should be more reliable even if the 5089 window isn't on top. 
Disabled ambient occlusion & cartoon effects while in the map, which helps map performance (the effects generally are not seen anyway from a distance).


**INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS:

Open '5089 v1.55.exe' , wait for a bit for the self extractor to open, specify the directory where u want to extract the game folder, open the extracted folder and play.....
OR
Extract it yourself using 'WinRAR'

Always open the game using run as administrator
